vote.title:
To authorize the issuance of unlimited tax bonds in an amount not to exceed $8,515,000 for recreation and park-related projects; and to declare an emergency ($8,515,000.00).

Section 44-1(b) of the City Charter.
vote.description:
Explanation
 
This ordinance authorizes the issuance of unlimited tax bonds in an amount not to exceed $8,515,000 for recreation and park-related projects.  The sale will be conducted on a negotiated basis.
 
Title
 
To authorize the issuance of unlimited tax bonds in an amount not to exceed $8,515,000 for recreation and park-related projects; and to declare an emergency ($8,515,000.00).
 
Section 44-1(b) of the City Charter.
 
 
Body
 
See attached file: City of Columbus - 2022 New Money Bonds - Unlimited Tax Rec. Park Ordinance (2016 Election).pdf
